AI Description: HYPRE (High Performance Preconditioners) is a library of high performance preconditioners and solvers for the solution of large, sparse linear systems of equations on massively parallel computers. It provides scalable algorithms for solving large-scale scientific and engineering applications.
Core Features: 1. Scalable algorithms for solving large-scale linear systems. 2. Preconditioners and solvers optimized for massively parallel computers. 3. Support for various parallel computing architectures. 4. Integration with other computational software and libraries.
General Tags: Preconditioners, Solvers, Linear Systems, Sparse Matrices
